gfs_socket_address.name: GFS Server
gfs_socket_address.description: The address for the Giraffe Flight Software socket. The web server will use this to communicate while on the ground.

gfs_socket_port.name: GFS Port
gfs_socket_port.description: The port for the Giraffe Flight Software socket. The web server will use this to communicate while on the ground.

logging_level.name: Logging Level
logging_level.description: The logging level for the ground station. Error = less logs, Debug = more logs.

gfs_config_interval.name: GFS Config Interval (ms)
gfs_config_interval.description: The interval at which the web server will pull the config from the Flight Software.

gfs_data_interval.name: GFS Data Interval (ms)
gfs_data_interval.description: The interval at which the web server will pull data from the Flight Software.

gfs_errors_interval.name: GFS Errors Interval (ms)
gfs_errors_interval.description: The interval at which the web server will pull errors from the Flight Software.

gfs_log_files_interval.name: GFS Log Files Interval (ms)
gfs_log_files_interval.description: The interval at which the web server will pull log file information from the Flight Software.

data_update_interval.name: GDL Data Update Interval (ms)
data_update_interval.description: The rate at which to poll the Giraffe Data Link Server

socket_address.name: GDL Socket Address
socket_address.description: The address for the Giraffe Data Logger socket. The web server will use this to communicate while on the ground.

socket_port.name: GDL Socket Port
socket_port.description: The port for the Giraffe Data Logger socket. The web server will use this to communicate while on the ground.

influx_enabled.name: InfluxDB Enabled
influx_enabled.description: Whether or not to enable InfluxDB.

influx_db_url.name: Influx URL
influx_db_url.description: The address for the InfluxDB (2.X) server with the port. This should include the protocol (http or https).

influx_org.name: Influx Organization
influx_org.description: The organization for the InfluxDB server.

influx_bucket.name: Influx Bucket
influx_bucket.description: The bucket for the InfluxDB server.

influx_interval_ms.name: Influx Update Interval (ms)
influx_interval_ms.description: The interval at which the web server will request updates from the Flight Software.

influx_retention_duration.name: Influx Retention Policy Duration
influx_retention_duration.description: The retention policy to use for the InfluxDB database.

enabled.name: APRS.fi Enabled
enabled.description: Whether or not to enable APRS.fi tracking

api_key.name: APRS.fi API Key
api_key.description: The API key for the APRS.fi API. https://aprs.fi/page/api

name.name: APRS.fi Name
name.description: The name of the station to track. This includes the SSID.

check_interval_s.name: APRS.fi Check Interval (s)
check_interval_s.description: The interval at which the web server will request updates from APRS.fi. Please be nice to their servers. https://aprs.fi/page/api

users.name: GGS WebSocket Users
users.description: An object containing all of the users that have connected with statistics.

num_current_clients.name: Number of Current Clients
num_current_clients.description: The number of clients that are currently connected to the ggs web socket.

num_current_streams.name: Number of Current Streams
num_current_streams.description: The number of streams that are currently open.

num_current_users.name: Number of Current Users
num_current_users.description: The number of users that are currently connected to the ggs web socket.

current_users.name: Current Users
current_users.description: The users that are currently connected to the ggs web socket.

this_doesnt_exist.name: This Doesn't Exist
this_doesnt_exist.description: This is a made up data point.
